Forms

Types

Adds a tab
Forms
Minimum time between submitting new form
[OzzModz] Advanced Forms Last Update
Users will have to wait this many seconds between submitting new form.
[OzzModz] Advanced Forms
Can approve/deny submitted forms
Can extend promotion poll end date
Can view forms
Advanced Forms Permissions
Minimum attachments
Minimum limit of attachments for a form, if you have used Attachment feild in form.
Add conditional question
Add New Form
Add new question
Add secondary user groups
If you wish to add secondary user groups to the member's account after they submit this form, check this box.
Add Form Type
Promotion Options - You did not select any user groups to instantly add the user to
Agreement Text
All of the above
This action will also close the poll
Report answer color

This will change the answer color in report posts and PCs in all styles. Leave blank to use the default text color for your styles.

WARNING: If you include a BB Code in your question report formatting, these color settings may appear in the questions or answers. If you are including codes such as the CODE BB Code in your question report format, DO NOT use these color options. Format the colors in your question report format instead.

If there are conditional questions attached to this question, they will also be deleted.
If you are saving answers for this form to the database, answers to this question will also be deleted.
Answer type
Answers
Require approval
If you want the thread or post created when a member submits this form to be moderated and require approval, check this box.
Approved by:
Approved PC text

Enter the text for the approved application PC.
Replacement Variable: {1} = Form Name
Approved PC title
Enter the title for the approved form PC. Leave blank if you do not want to send an approved PC.
As attachment
Available forms
Wrap IP in BBCode end

Enter the BBCode end code to wrap an unregistered user's IP in. LEAVE BLANK if not used.
Example: [/SIZE]
Wrap IP in BBCode start

Enter the BBCode start code to wrap an unregistered user's IP in. LEAVE BLANK if not used.
Example: [SIZE=7]
Below question
Button phrase
Enter the phrase that will be displayed in the button
Report by PC
Check this box if you would like to send a new PC when this form is submitted.
Change primary user group
If you wish to promote the member to a different primary usergroup after they submit this form, check this box.
Change to
Checkbox limit error
Enter the error to be displayed if the users makes too many selections.
Checkbox answer limit
You may limit the number of selections a user can make for a checkbox. Set to zero for no limit.
Choose one
Clear answers
Close poll
Enter the number of days the poll poll should run.
Select the question and answer that must be given for this question to be displayed
Conditional on QID
Conditional questions are questions that will only be displayed if another question is answered with a specific answer.

Select the type of answer you expect to receive for this question.

If this is a header phrase select 'None - This is a Header Phrase'.
If this is a date picker, the date will appear in reports in the format set in your language options.
The File Upload answer type displays the standard XF upload prompt and files are displayed as attachments in PC's, new threads and thread replies. If you use BOTH the PC and new thread or existing thread options at the same time, the attachments will only appear in the thread or reply. Attachments are not displayed in the second thread if that report option is selected.

If this is a Thread prefixes answer type, all available prefixes that the user can use for the forum the thread is to be posted in will be listed. And the thread prefix will be set to the user's selection.
The Thread prefixes answer type only works for new threads, it DOES NOT work with "Report in second new thread" or "Report in existing thread".
The Thread prefixes answer type DOES NOT appear in the form report.

NOTE: If this is a WYSIWYG answer type and you want people to be able to upload photos, etc. into the field, you must add a File Upload question to the form.

NOTE: If this is a File Upload answer type, these permissions for the user's user group MUST be set to 'Yes' for the forum the form is going to be posted in:
Post new thread
View attachments to posts
Upload attachments to posts
Please confirm that you want to approve:
Please confirm that you want to deny:
Please confirm that you want to reset all user counts for this form
Form cooldown

Minimum time between user can submit this form again.
Set 0 to no limit.
Set -1 to limit with one submit to user (or IP if guest).
Copy
You have already reached the limit of the number of times you can fill out this form.
Create normal poll

Check this box if you would like to create a normal poll when this form is submitted.
NOTE: You MUST select 'Report in New Thread' in Report Type/Thread report options if you use this option.
Create promotion voting poll

If you want members to vote on this form, check this box.
This will create a Yes/No poll in the thread.
The user will be automatically promoted (or not) based on the outcome of the poll.
NOTE: You MUST select 'Report in New Thread' in Report Type/Thread report options if you use this option.

The poll, [url='{link}']{poll}[/url] resulted in an error during processing. Please check the thread for any possible reason (poll deleted from thread, etc.) that might cause the system to be unable to process this poll.
Error processing form poll
CSV export requires a PHP {version} and newer.
Promotion Options - You must select a user group to promote user to when including decision links
Decision or poll promote
Places decision links in thread and/or creates a voting poll
Default answer

If you wish to provide a default answer for this question enter it here.
All question types except Agreement, File Upload and Header can have a default answer.
Text Questions: Will display what you enter here.
Single Line Text Questions: Will display either what you enter here and/or the value for the following tags. You may combine text and tags.
   {username} = User's Name
   {userid} = User's User ID
   {email} = User's Email
   {location} = User's Location
   {custom.CustomUserFieldID} = Custom User Field
      Example: {custom.skype}
      Custom user fields MUST be a Single-line text box custom field
Spinbox Questions: You may enter a default value such as 0 or 0.01
Yes/No Questions: You MUST use the exact Xenforo Yes or No phrase including any capital letters. In English this is Yes or No.
Single selection forum list: Enter the name of the forum EXACTLY how it is entered in the Forums/Nodes list.
All other question types: You must enter one of the selections EXACTLY as you entered it in Expected Answers.
The Default answer you have defined is not in the Expected answers
You are saving the answers to questions for this form in the database, they will be deleted if you delete this form.
Delete PCs

Check this box to automatically delete sent PCs from the Private Conversation sender's conversation list. This will prevent the database from increasing in size if the PC sender never logs in to read and delete their PCs. This will also close the PC to replies.
Deleted form
Denied by:
Denied PC text

Enter the text for the denied application PC.
Replacement Variable: {1} = Form Name
Denied PC title
Enter the title for the denied form PC. Leave blank if you do not want to send an denied PC.
Deny

The description for this question.
(Displayed below answer area - Not displayed if blank)
Direct access URL
Do not change
Edit Form
Edit Question
Edit Type
Report type - There is an invalid email address in Email recipients
Email report options
Email recipients

Email address(es) to send reports to. Use a comma to separate the values.
(ie: youremail@website.com,youremail@yoursite.com)
If you do not want to send email when a form is submitted, leave this field blank.
NOTE: Attachments to forms are not sent in emailed reports.
End date error
You may enter the error displayed if this form is used after the end date. Leave blank to use the standard no permission error.

If you want this form to stop being available on a certain date, select it here.
Uses site guest timezone.
Leave date blank if not used.
This has no effect if using this form as a quick reply in a thread.
{answer} variable is missing from Report format
RGBA is not allowed for question or answer colors
You did not select an Answer condition for this conditional question
You did not select a Question condition for this conditional question
Email recipient list (Report Type tab) contains more than 200 characters
Report Type - You can not use Report in existing thread and Quick reply option button at the same time
Report type-Thread report options: Another form is being used with a post thread button in the selected forum
Report Type - Forum selected is already in use in form: {form}
You did not enter an error message for the checkbox answer limit
You must answer at least one question on this form
No questions that have answers which may be used as a conditional have been defined.
PC Sender (Form) the same as one of the Private conversation recipients (Report Type->PC report options)
Private conversation recipients (Report Type tab) contains more than 200 characters
The user you have set to post the thread in thread report options does not exist
Report Type - You must select a forum when using the Quick reply option button
{question} variable is missing from Report format

This answer to this question is being used in the form report title.
You must provide a Question error or remove the question answer from the report title.
Report Type - You can not use this form as a quick reply without using Report in existing thread
You can not create a poll for a form used as a quick reply to a thread
Return link (Redirect Options tab) contains more than 200 characters
The user you have set to post the second thread in thread report options does not exist
Report Type - You can not use Use form as thread quick reply and Quick reply option button at the same time
You may not use question answer {number} in the report title. It is not a required question.
You may not assign answers to the report title until you have defined questions for the form
Question answer {number} does not exist and can't be used in the Report title

The report title could not be created
Questions {questions} were not answered.
Please notify the site admin that you received this error.

The report title could not be created
Question {question} was not answered.
Please notify the site admin that you received this error.
You may not use question answer {number} in the report title. It is not a type that can be used in the report title.
Report in existing thread
Report type - The existing thread entered does not exist.
If you would like the report posted in an existing thread, enter the thread ID number for that thread here. Set to zero if you do not want to use this option.
Expected answers
The question type you have selected requires Expected answers

If you selected 'Single Selection' or 'Multiple Choice' for the answer type, enter the answers you want to display for this question.
Place each answer on a new line.
This is not needed for the 'Single selection forum list' answer type.

If you selected 'Spinbox' for the answer type, enter the number of decimal places that will be allowed and the step or just the step for whole numbers.
(decimal example: 0.0001 = 4 decimal places that will step in 0001 increments)
(whole number example: 2 = step in increments of 2)

If you selected 'Agreement' for the answer type, enter the text that will be displayed next to the checkbox. If this is left blank with the 'Agreement' answer type selected, no checkbox will be displayed.
* Cannot be used to import.
Export file format
Export forms
Extend
File(s) attached
File display
Select how the file will be displayed if it is an image
Filling out form:
Form
This form is active

Check this box to show this form to members.
This box does not need to be checked if using this form as a quick reply in a thread.
User criteria - You did not set the user criteria for this form
Form name
Enter the name of this form.
Form not found
Form order
Form type
If you select a form type, the form will be listed under that type and users must meet the criteria for BOTH the form type and this form to be able to fill out this form.
Forms list
Forum for new thread
The forum you have defined in Default answer does not exist
The user entered in Poster User Name MUST have permission to post in the forum selected.
Forum home
Forums for option button
Select the forums where the quick reply option button will be shown in threads
In message - full size
Use this option to scan a web-accessible directory containing your form definitions.
Import forms
Forms import was completed successfully
Merge import
The default action of an import is to replace all existing information. To keep your existing information and merge the import with the existing information, check this box.
Please supply a valid forms XML file.
Use this option to import an XML file containing your form definitions.
Include decision links

Places both an approve and deny link in the thread where the form is posted.
NOTE: You MUST select 'Report in New Thread' or 'Report in existing thread' in Report Type/Thread report options if you use this option.
Include PHP File When Approved

This is for an external file to process anything that may be needed.
LEAVE BLANK IF NOT USED.
Enter the relative path to a PHP file to be included when this form is approved. (example: includes/includefile.php)
This file will be run before returning to the thread when decision links are used, or during the poll cron task. It should NOT return any values to the forms system, return to any page in Xenforo or display any information.
This is a simple PHP include. No variables are passed to the file. No support will be provided for included files.
Include member name/IP address
If you want to include the member name on the first line of reports, check this box. If the user is unregistered, their IP address will be included instead of their member name.
Insert Default Questions
Instant promote
Instantly promotes a user when they submit this form
Publicly visible
If selected, this form will be visible for everyone regardless user criteria settings.
Link defined below
Redirect options - You did not provide a return link
Form submit log
Log record by {username} from {time}
Form submit log
Logs
Main Form Settings
Make moderator

To make the user a moderator if the poll result is Yes, select the type of moderator you want them to be.
NOTE: If Forum Moderator is selected, the form MUST contain a question with the answer type 'Single Selection (Dropdown Forum List)' and the user will be made a moderator in the selected forum.

Question numbers in RED may be used in report title creation.
Conditional questions ALWAYS appear immediately after the question that triggers them no matter where they are in the sort order shown here.
NOTE: If using a question in the report title, you MUST arrange the questions so any conditional questions appear immediately after the question that triggers the conditional question. This ensures the question/answer numbering is correct.
You must have to upload minimum {attachments} attachments.
Misc. options
Form - You must enter a name for this form
Report in new thread
Check this box if you would like to create a new thread when this form is submitted.
Newly created thread/post
Next to question
(DID NOT ANSWER QUESTION)
No custom fields have been created yet.
You do not meet the criteria for any forms. No forms are available for you.
Report Type - You must select a Forum for new thread
Report Type - You selected 'Post thread button to form' without selecting a Forum for new thread
Normal poll
Creates a normal poll when this form is submitted. It DOES NOT affect promotion options and should not be used if Poll promotion is used.
Normal Poll - You must enter a poll question
Report Type or Normal Poll - You can not create a normal voting poll without posting the form in a new thread.
You are not allowed to submit this form.
Report Type - You can not post this form in both a New thread and an Existing thread
Only thread starter
Check this box to only allow the thread starter to use the form button
Order
If you use question answers in your report title, be sure to match the new question numbers in the report title after changing the order.
Parse URLs
If you want to parse URLs so they are live in posts and PCs, check this box.
User PC options
Private conversation recipients
PC report options
PC sender name

Enter the name of the member that will send private conversations. This is used for any PCs sent by the forms system about this form.
NOTE: This must be set to a valid user name. The user name must be set to something other than a user name that may need to receive PCs from the forms system. (you can't send PCs to yourself)
It is strongly suggested that you set up a special user to send PCs from the forms system. (IE: a username of 'Forms System')
PC text
Report Options - You did not enter the text for the User PC

Enter the text for the PC here.
Replacement Variables:
{1} = Name of Member Submitting Form
{2} = Your Site Name
{3} = PC Sender Name
Placeholder
Text and WYSIWYG answer types can have a placeholder displayed in the field. If you wish to display a placeholder, enter it here. 200 character limit. Leave blank if not used.
Promotion Options & Normal Poll - You can not have both a promotion poll and a normal poll at the same time
Poll creation is not available in selected forum
Promotion Options - You must enter a question for the promotion poll
Report Type - Poster user name does not exist
Promotion Options - You did not select a primary user group to instantly promote the user to
Report Type or Promotion Options - You can not create a promotion voting poll without posting the form in a new thread.
Promotions are only applied to registered users. You can not promote an unregistered/not logged in user.
Promotion not found
Promotion options
QID
Quick reply option button

Check this box to put a button in the quick reply box to optionally use this form as a reply to a thread.
This differs from "Use form as thread quick reply" in that it does not replace the quick reply box in the thread. And it applies to all threads in a forum, not individual threads.
Report question color
This will change the question color in report posts and PCs in all styles. Leave blank to use the default text color for your styles.
Normal Poll - You must enter at least two responses for the poll
Question error

What error should be displayed if the user fails to answer this question?
NOTE: If you do not include an error, the question will be optional and the user will not be required to answer it.
NOTE: If this is a Thread prefixes question and there is a thread prefix selected in the Thread report options for this form, and you include an error here, the error will never be displayed and the default prefix for the form will be used.
WARNING: If you are promoting a user to a forum moderator with Poll & Promote YOU MUST enter an error for the 'Single selection forum list' answer type.
Enter the question that should be asked with this poll.
Question or Header phrase
Enter the question to ask the member or the header phrase for this section of the application. You may use BBCode here.
Question not found
Question Order
Question position in report Post/PC
Select where you want the question to appear in the report post/pc.
Two lines below previous question
One line below previous question
Same line as previous question
You did not enter a Question or Header phrase
Questions
Use form as thread quick reply

If you entered an existing thread above, you can use this form as a substitute for the quick reply box in the thread.
NOTE: Form user criteria is ignored when this option is selected and normal XenForo reply permissions are used.
After submitting this form, the user will be sent to your selection below.
Redirect options
Regular expression validation error
What error should be displayed if the answer fails regular expression validation?
Report Type - You must report the form in a thread, by email or in a PC
Report format

Enter the report format for this question. Use BB Codes.
This MUST contain the {question} and {answer} replacement variables, even if one of them is not used.
Report title

Enter the title that will be used on reports when members fill out this application.
Replacement variables:
{1} = Name of Member Submitting Form
{A#} = Answer to question number (example: {A4})
This is limited to these answer types:
Date picker
Single line text
Single selection dropdown
Single selection forum list
Single selection radio
Yes/No
NOTE: The question used for an {A#} must be required to be answered.
NOTE: Use caution when using these options. A thread title is limited to 150 characters. Use that as a guide when considering using replacement variables in the title.
Report type
Select and define how you would like this form to be reported on your site.
Reset user name
Enter the user name of the user you want to reset the form count for
Please enter the name of the user to reset the counts for this form
Return link
If you selected 'Link Defined Below', enter the link here.
Return member to
Reverse instant promote

If you wish to reverse all actions taken by Instant Promote, check this box.
NOTE: This reverses the action of Instant Promote no matter what the outcome of the promotion is.
Save answers to database

By checking this box all answers to questions for this form (except file upload and header answer types) will be saved to the xf_snog_forms_answers table in the database.
Under normal use this should not be checked.
NOTE: No processing is, or will be done with the data that is saved. The option is provided for those that would like to process the information on their own. People using this option should already know how to use, and extract information from, multiple database tables.
No support will be given for processing the xf_snog_forms_answers table.
Report in second new thread

Check this box if you would like to create a second new thread in a different forum when this form is submitted.
NOTE: All settings above are used to post the second thread with the exception of Watch Thread, User Name and Forum settings. No promotion poll will be created in this thread.
Forum for second thread
Report Type - You did not select the forum for the the second thread
The user entered in Second Thread Poster User Name MUST have permission to post in the forum selected.
Second thread poster user name

Enter the user name for the member that will be used to post the reports in the second thread for this form.
NOTE: If not set, the user name of user submitting the form will be used. If the user submitting the form is unregistered, the user name of the first super-admin will be used.
Send PC to user
If you wish to send a PC to the user after they submit this form, check this box.
Send ties to
Promotion Options - Send ties to not a valid user name
Enter the user name of the person that should receive notification in the event of a tie.
Form - You must enter a PC sender name for this form
Form - PC sender name does not exist
Report Options - PC Sender and Promotion Options/Poll Poll Promote - Send Ties To should not be the same user ID.
Show above form
What you enter here will be shown above the questions for the form.
Show below form
What you enter here will be shown below the questions for the form.
Show in navigation tab
Show question in report
Check this box to show the actual question in the report post/pc. If this box is not checked, only the answer to this question will be posted.
Check this box to show this type in the forms list when the forms navigation tab is selected.
Check this box to show this type in the forms widget
Show question if not answered

Check this box to show the actual question in the report post/pc if it is not answered. If this box is not checked, the question will not be displayed if the question is not answered.
NOTE: If this box is not checked, the unanswered question will also not be saved to the database if the "Save answers to database" option is selected in the main form options.
Show in widget
Spinbox (number input)

If you want this form to become available on a certain date, select it here.
Uses site guest timezone.
Leave date blank if not used.
This has no effect if using this form as a quick reply in a thread.
If specified, all users will view this form using the selected style, regardless of their personal style preference.
Submit count
Success message
Enter what you would like displayed when a user successfully submits this form.
Are you sure you want to clear the form submit log?
Match regular expression
You may require Single Line, Multi-Line Text and Spinbox answers to match a regular expression.
Post thread button to form

Check this box to have the Post Thread button in the forum node selected above go directly to this form.
WARNING: This option should only be used once per forum node. Multiple forms in the same forum node with this option selected will result in unexpected results.
Post thread button phrase
If Post Thread Button to Form is checked above, enter a new phrase for the button here. Leave blank to use the default Post Thread phrase.
Thread report options
Poster user name

Enter the user name for the member that will be used to post the reports for this form.
NOTE: If not set, the user name of user submitting the form will be used. If the user submitting the form is unregistered, the user name of the first super-admin will be used.
Thread prefix

If you would like to use a thread prefix for the report, select the prefix here.
NOTE: ALL PREFIXES ARE LISTED HERE. The prefix you select MUST BE A VALID PREFIX for the forum the thread will be created in. Also the user group the member filling out the form belongs to must be able to use the prefix in the forum the thread will be created in.
Thread prefixes (No more than 1 per form)
In message - thumbnail
Promotion Options - You must enter a user name for 'Send ties to'
A form poll has resulted in a tie
Report Type - You must enter a title for reports
Report Type - You did not enter who to send the PC to
Report Type - Private conversation recipients - {names} not valid name(s)
This type is active

Check this box to activate this form type.
If this type is not active, all forms that use this type will not be shown even if the form itself is active.
You did not set the user criteria for this form type
A user must meet the criteria set here to view this form type and fill out all forms in this form type (including admins)
You did not enter a name for this form type

Select the type of answer you expect to receive for this question.
Answers types marked with * may be used as a trigger for conditional questions.
WARNING: If this question has conditional questions attached to it and you change the type to a type that can not be used by conditional questions, the conditional questions attached to it will be deleted.

If this is a header phrase select 'None - This is a Header Phrase'.
If this is a date picker, the date will appear in reports in the format set in your language options.
The File Upload answer type displays the standard XF upload prompt and files are displayed as attachments in PC's, new threads and thread replies. If you use BOTH the PC and new thread or existing thread options at the same time, the attachments will only appear in the thread or reply. Attachments are not displayed in the second thread if that report option is selected.

If this is a Thread prefixes answer type, all available prefixes that the user can use for the forum the thread is to be posted in will be listed. And the thread prefix will be set to the user's selection.
The Thread prefixes answer type only works for new threads, it DOES NOT work with "Report in second new thread" or "Report in existing thread".
The Thread prefixes answer type DOES NOT appear in the form report.

NOTE: If this is a WYSIWYG answer type and you want people to be able to upload photos, etc. into the field, you must add a File Upload question to the form.

NOTE: If this is a File Upload answer type, these permissions for the user's user group MUST be set to 'Yes' for the forum the form is going to be posted in:
Post new thread
View attachments to posts
Upload attachments to posts
